p: All tested bacterial strains were maintained on Lysogeny Broth agar (LB agar preparation: 10 g tryptone, 5 g yeast extract, 10 g NaCl, and 15 g agar per litre, autoclaved at 121 °C for 20 min) at different temperatures: 26 °C for B. cereus, P. fluorescens, and A. bohemicus, and 37 °C for K. marina and E. coli. All inocula were prepared with fresh cultures plated the day before the test.
